page.title: 12A School Day In Halewood
page.content: On Wednesday 8th May 1985 I woke up at 7.15 a.m. I had my breakfast, then I played on my{computer.}After that I had my vitamin and flouride tablets and went to{school}in the car. At school I waited until the bell rang. We did some English work first then went to Assembly. After playtime we finished our English and did one page of Maths before lunch. I played on my own until I went in for lunch, then afterwards I played football. When the whistle blew I went to line up. In class, Mrs. Jones told us about the Domesday Project. After school I went to{Chess}Club and played 3 games, then I waited for my Mum to take me home. After tea I played with my Lego and watched{television}until bedtime at 9.00 p.m. J. HARRISON.
